article.title: List_of_Olympic_medalists_in_biathlon
article.paragraph: This is the complete list ofOlympic GamesOlympicmedalistsinbiathlon.
Medalists inmilitary patrol, a precursor to biathlon, areMilitary patrol at the 1924 Winter Olympicslisted separately.
